1101100010000111 0010000100111111 0 -> sum: 1111100111000110, cout: 0
0111010010001111 1010100001001011 0 -> sum: 0001110011011010, cout: 1
0101101111010100 0010010000101010 0 -> sum: 0111111111111110, cout: 0
0011100100101010 0000100101101001 1 -> sum: 0100001010010100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
